alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 19 at 1:22PM MDT until August 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT MONDAY 12 PM TO 8 PM... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from 12 PM to 8 PM Monday. * IMPACTS: Strong southwest wind, low humidity, and above normal temperatures will create erratic fire behavior with existing fires or any new wildland fires. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 283 and 289. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * WIND: Southwest 20 to 35 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the upper 80s to lower 90s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
